description:
PhoneGap is a modern and easy way to build Apps for mobile devices. With PhoneGap you can build your App once and then publish it to all the platforms out there. The good news is that PhoneGap uses the common and easy to use web technologies to build Apps so you don't need to learn a new programming language if you are already familiar with web technologies.

Pick up this course now and start your journey into the amazing and exciting world of Apps.
title: Cross-Platform Apps in 1 Hour: PhoneGap 2015 Update
